retrieved 28 june 2011 . & # 160 ; in 2007 , soderbergh and tony gilroy contributed an audio commentary to the dvd re-release of the third man by the criterion collection .
ron vawter ( sex , lies , and videotape and king of the hill ) jeroen krabbe ( kafka , king of the hill and ocean 's twelve ) soderbergh claims to not be a fan of possessory credits , and prefers not to have his name front and center at the start of a film .
" the fact that i 'm not an identifiable brand is very freeing , " says soderbergh , " because people get tired of brands and they switch brands .
i 've never had a desire to be out in front of anything , which is why i don 't take a possessory credit . " [ 50 ] soderbergh lives in new york city .
he is an atheist . [ 53 ] steven soderbergh : " i can see the end of my career " by henry barnes , guardian , july 14 , 2009 the gibnut is a belizean rodent -- something like a beaver without the big tail .
you can read about him here the gibnet is highly prized as a game animal and a add wine and simmer for ten minutes to develop final taste who knows all about gibnuts , and see what he says .
mumbai police chief : i got no warninghasan gafoor said that he never received a warning of an impending seaborne attack on his city early indications suggest the plane came in too short and hit the seawall at the airport add a favorite ( file a bookmark ) to tzipi livni news timeline * time by locationromânia post 1989 & # 8211 ; catherine durandin şi zoe petre | cadran politic home vitrina cu cărți românia post 1989 & # 8211 ; catherine durandin şi zoe petre posted by cezar dobre on apr 5th , 2011 / / comments off prima parte a volumului intitulat „ o eliberare dificilă ” ne arată că în primele momente după căderea regimurilor comuniste în europa de est , numeroşi analişti au impus termenul „ tranziţie ” ca şi cum punctul de plecare şi cel de sosire ar fi fost perfect cunoscute .
aceste borne simbolice erau întunecate în punctul de plecare apăsate de crimele comunismului , dar luminoase în perspectiva unei sosiri presupuse într-o lume liberă şi prosperă .
doamna catherine durandin impresionează pentru faptul că , pe lângă o cunoaştere aprofundată a realităţilor istorice ale poporului nostru , a dat dovadă de o mare atenţie şi sensibilitate atunci când a pus problema procesului de integrare în nato şi uniunea europeană .
dacă procesul integrării a pus mai puţine probleme şi datorită maşinii de putere americane care a funcţionat sprijinită de propriul „ think-tank ” , procesul de integrare în ue este mai complex şi aceasta datorită faptului că românia este o ţară europeană şi se poate irita numai la faptul că trebuie să demonstreze acest lucru în faţa comisiei europene .
în capitolele următoare ale cărţii , doamna zoe petre , o excepţională cunoscătoare a lumii antice , dar și a istoriei poporului român , remarca cu privire la distrugerea simbolurilor puterii comuniste în decembrie 1989 că lozinca „ jos comunismul ” este greu de crezut că a fost o provocare a kgb-ului – care , logic , nu putea adopta un astfel de slogan .
dacă nu a fost prima , cel puţin a fost printre primii analişti care a prezentat cu adevărat o realitate dureroasă pentru noi românii , mai ales pentru o anumită categorie de români , vizavi de evenimentele din decembrie 1989 când șefii securității au decis pe tăcute să adopte pe cât posibil politica struţului şi să lase în seama armatei şi eventual a gărzilor patriotice sarcina de a se „ sacrifica pentru salvarea regimului ceaușist ” .
un profesor de valoarea doamnei zoe petre nu putea să nu pună adevărul istoric în faţa legendei armatei devotate poporului , de asemenea a făcut o distincţie clară între instituţia „ odioasă a securităţii ” şi activitatea cadrelor acesteia , în timpul revoluţiei din decembrie , şi ceea ce este cel mai dureros pentru unii care au participat la conducerea țării în anii ‘ 90 este faptul că atât ion iliescu , cât şi cei din anturajul lui ştiau prea bine că „ teroriştii ” sunt o ficţiune criminală si un „ spectacol regizat ” .
evenimentele care au urmat : martie 1990 , târgu mureş , când regimul lui ion iliescu îşi asuma deschis tezele naţional-comunismului , şi piaţa universităţii , iunie 1991 , au dus la netezirea drumului cdr care în final l-a propulsat pe preşedintele emil constantinescu care a adus prima alternanţă democratică la putere după 60 de ani .
indiferent de dificultăţile deseori insurmontabile ale legiferării , preşedintele emil constantinescu a fost primul şef de stat român care a condamnat comunismul , a cerut iertare în numele statului pe care îl reprezenta atunci tuturor victimelor represiunii anticomuniste cerând parlamentului româniei să adopte măsurile reparatorii necesare care decurgeau din această condamnare .
administraţia constantinescu a fost cea care a pus bazele integrării europene şi euroatlantice a româniei , iar politica de bună vecinătate a fost exprimată în discursul domniei sale în 2 decembrie 1996 la reuniunea la vârf a osce de la lisabona şi s-a situat pe parcursul întregului său mandat într-o logică a complementarităţii faţă de politicile de aderare la uniunea europeană şi integrare euroatlantică .
din nefericire , sublinia doamna zoe petre , refuzând să accepte faptul ca victoria din 1996 fusese decisivă , dar parţială , şi nu un triumf absolut , nucleul dur al partizanilor cdr nerăbdător şi radical , s-a desprins repede de realităţile unei puteri care era obligată să negocieze fiecare pas spre reformă , mai mult „ trădarea iubită ” de unii politicieni din cadrul convenţiei democratice , care au dus în secret tratative cu psd – ne referim aici concret la pnl – , au dat lovitura de graţie cdr-ului .
cu toate acestea , procesul de democratizare a devenit astfel ireversibil şi înfrângerea partidelor din fosta convenţie democratică nu a mai putut să schimbe radical victoriile dobândite în cei patru ani de guvernare democratică a româniei .
în perfect acord cu doamna catherine durandin , care este fără niciun dubiu istoricul francez cel mai informat cu privire la românia pe care o cunoaşte foarte bine şi o iubeşte cu inteligenţă şi pasiune , doamna zoe petre , cu un discernământ critic , deseori amar , nu numai că refuză să inventeze „ o idilă ” despre revoluţie , cum sunt multe cărţi apărute pe piaţă , ci scoate tema excepţiei româneşti din categoria fatalităţilor istorice obiective şi o înscrie în istoria concretă a postcomunismului .

حاد علیه بشریت - kabul press | afghanistan press | کابل پرس | افغانستان پرس کابل پرس من > واژه كليدها > واژه های کلیدی در کابل پرس > دو قرن جنایت در افغانستان : جنایات نسل کشی ، قتل عام ، برده داری ، جنگ های داخلی ، جنایات ( ... ) دو قرن جنایت در افغانستان : جنایات نسل کشی ، قتل عام ، برده داری ، جنگ های داخلی ، جنایات جنگی و جنایات حاد علیه بشریت سلام بر شجاعی سرباز فداکاری که فاشیسم را خاکسترنشین کرده است هزاره ، صدا ، فرهنگ و تاریخ آنان در ادبیات جهان ؛ 115 شاعر از 66 کشور جهان برای مردم هزاره شعر آفریده اند ارزگان خاص : فرمانده ی ضد طالب هدف حمله ی طالبان ، قاچاقچیان مواد مخدر و حکومت کرزی سکوت فرهنگیان ، سیاستمداران ، مدافعین حقوق بشر و مبشرین وحدت و همبستگی مردم افغانستان دربرابر پیام عید فطر گلب الدین حکمتیار چه معنی دارد گلبدین حکمتیار ، هزاره ها را مستقیم به نسل کشی و کوچ اجباری تهدید کرد پیام اشغالگر افغان ملا عمر در سالگرد کشتار شمالی ؛ ریشخندی به ده ها هزار قربانی هزاره ، اوزبیک و تاجیک زندگی یکی از گروه های قومی که بیشترین آزار و اذیت را تجربه کرده است کمپین نام گذاری جاده ها و چهار راهی ها به نام قربانیان جنگ های افغانستان اعتراض هزاره های استرالیایی به نسل کشی در شهر کویته حملات منظم کوچی طالبان به مردم در بهسود و دایمیرداد پاره ای از جنایات اوغان ها به روایت بانویی کهنسال از دایکندی خیزش ضد استبدادی واصلاح طلبانۀ دانشجویان دانشگاه کابل یا نقطۀ عطفی درتاریخ نهضت عدالتخواهی افغانستان فاجعۀ هفتم جوزای سال 1386 شهرشبرغان را چگونه می توان فراموش کرد ؟ چند نقشه تاریخی از زمانی که کشوری بنام افغانستان وجود خارجی نداشت یادبود قربانیان هفتم جوزای 1386 در شبرغان ، کشته شده به فرمان جمعه خان همدرد سلیمان خیل به افکار عمومی : کوچی ها مسلح نیستند ؛ سلیمان خیل بصورت محرمانه به سفارت آمریکا : بیشتر از نیم طالبان کوچی هستند ده ها کشته و زخمی در قندهار ؛ تروریزم و قبیله گرایی همچنان در جنگ با غیر نظامیان واژه كليدهاى يك گروهآموزش ، مکاتب و دانشگاهآيساف ، ناتو و نيروهای بين المللیاستخبارات ، جاسوس و جاسوسیاعتراض ، راهپیمایی و تظاهراتافغانستان در المپیک 2012 لندنافغانستان و کشورهای منطقه و جهانانتخابات در افغانستانبهداشت و سلامتتبعیض ، تبعیض نژادی ، مذهبی و جنسیتیتجزیه افغانستانتروريزم ، کوچی طالبان ، طالبان و القاعدهجوانانحقوق کودکان و زناندو قرن جنایت در افغانستان : جنایات نسل کشی ، قتل عام ، برده داری ، جنگ های داخلی ، جنایات جنگی و جنایات حاد علیه بشریتدين ، عقايد و باورهاسرشماریشهید آزادی عبدالخالق هزارهشورای ملی ، پارلمان ، مجلسطبیعت و محيط زيستعلم و دانش0 | 20 محفوظ و متعلق به سايت کابل پرس ( افغانستان پرس ) می باشد . guinea | reliefweb guinea guinée : de l & # 039 ; eau potable pour les habitants de pita conakry ( cicr ) – les 30 000 habitants de la ville de pita , en moyenne guinée , bénéficient désormais d 'un meilleur accès à l 'eau potable grâce à deux forages réalisés par le comité international de la croix-rouge ( cicr ) en collaboration avec la société des eaux de guinée ( seg ) .
the government is reconsidering the future of troop deployments after the withdrawal from afghanistan and the solomon islands , with more of a focus on aid signalled . " diye sordu.karaahmetoğlu , başbakan ’ ın yanıtlaması istemiyle tbmm başkanlığına sunduğu soru önergesinde şöyle dedi : " 2020 olimpiyat oyunlarına ev sahipliğini yapacak kentin belirleneceği buenos aires ’ e liderliğiniz altında , işadamı , bürokrat , sporcu , milletvekili ve bakanlarınızın ve ailelerinin bulunduğu kalabalık bir heyet gitmiştir .
bu heyetin harcamalarına ilişkin olarak , 2020 olimpiyatlarına ev sahipliği yapacak ülkenin belirleneceği toplantıya katılan heyette , sporcu , federasyon yetkilileri , antrenörler , bürokratlar , işadamları , milletvekilleri , bakanlar ve eşleri dâhil olmak üzere kimler yer almıştır ?
gençlik ve spor bakanlığı temsilcileri ve milli olimpiyat komitesi dışında diğerlerinin heyetinizde yer alma nedenleri ile görevleri nelerdir ? redhack ’ in sosyal medyada yayınladığı , yalnızca uçak masrafının 915 bin tl olduğu iddiası gerçek midir ?
uçak ve yolculuk masrafları dâhil olmak üzere , diğer harcamalar nelerdir ?
hangi bütçeden ne kadar harcama yapılmıştır ? 2020 olimpiyatları ’ nın sunumunun yapılacağı organizasyonun ülkemize toplam maliyeti ne kadar olmuştur ? "
kaynak : yorumlarpolitika - diğerchp heyetinin mısır temasları sürüyorolimpiyat masrafı soru önergesindeyıkımı durduran vekillere suç duyurusu " umudumuzu yitirmeyeceğiz " " yoksulun lokması daha da küçüldü " chp pm yarın toplanacakbaşbakan erdoğan , arjantin 'deçetinsaya : odtü 'deki olay doğrudan tacizdemirtaş : süreç bloke oldu diyemeyizgizli kapaklı çözüm süreci iflas etticumhurbaşkanı 'ndan " odtü " açıklamasıatamalarda kriterler neye göre belirlenecek ? başbakan 'a yolsuzluk sorusu " darbeciler de kahire 'de buluşuyor " " bilal erdoğan belediyeleri teftiş etmedi " abd 'ye müdahale mektubu " mısır 'da sizin kırıp döktüklerinizi toplayacağız " gezi olaylarında gerçek mermiyle ölen polis var mı ? odtü 'den yol açıklamasıyeni atanan büyükelçiler çankaya köşkü 'nde stationnement de montréal and tc media unveil new features for the p $ mobile service app stationnement de montréal et tc media dévoilent les nouveautés de l 'application p $ service mobile dünya gazetesionline abonelike-gazetedolar rezervi eriyor15 eylül 2013 pazaranasayfaekonomifinansdış haberlerpolitikatoplumsektörlerkategori̇lerfinansne , nerede , ne zamangündembi̇k i̇lanlarıdünya ihtdış i̇lişkileremtiai̇şletme-yönetimmevzuatnews in englishgüncelyorum i̇ncelemebölgelerdenözel dosyalarresmi gazetetiger monitorbankacılık sektörübilişimdemir-çelik sektörüenerji sektörügıda sektörühaberleşme sektörühizmetleri̇nşaat sektörükimya-petrokimya sektörümadencilik sektörümağazacılık-perakendecilik sektörümedya sektörüotomotiv sektörüplastik-kauçuk sektörüsanayisavunma sanayiisigortacılık sektörütarım ve hayvancılıktaşımacılık sektörütekstil sektörüturizm sektörü17 : 34 - ban memnun17 : 32 - merdan yanardağ tutuklandı17 : 30 - adıyaman havalimanı hizmete açıldı17 : 21 - narenciyede ihracat sezonu başlıyor16 : 55 - verim yüksek , fiyat düşük16 : 50 - adı ürgüpte bir parkta yaşayacak16 : 49 - olimpiyat ateşi içimizde sönmedi16 : 26 - irakta çatışma : 10 ölü16 : 10 - otomotiv ihracatını 4 il sırtlıyor15 : 58 - ada krizi devam ediyoradı ürgüp 'te bir parkta yaşayacak14 eylül 2013 cumartesi 16 : 50nevşehir 'in göreme beldesinde uğradığı bıçaklı saldırıda hayatını kaybeden japon turist mai kurihara 'nın adının , ürgüp ilçesinde bir parka verileceği bildirildi.nevşehi̇r - ürgüp belediye başkanı fahri yıldız , 43'üncü uluslararası ürgüp bağ bozumu festivali 'nin açılışında yaptığı konuşmada , suriye 'de , arakan 'da ve türk cumhuriyetlerindeki acıların üzerine göreme 'de yaşanan olayın , üzüntülerini artırdığını söyledi.japonlar ile türk milletinin çok iyi bir dostluğu olduğunu vurgulayan yıldız , japonların özellikle kapadokya 'yı ve ürgüp 'ü çok sevdiklerini ifade ederek , " keşke olmasaydı , keşke böyle bir olay bölgemizde değil , dünyanın hiçbir yerinde yaşanmasaydı .
maalesef kendini bilmez , kendi nefsinden başka bir şey düşünmeyen bir gafil , çok sevdiğimiz japon turistlerimizden birini katletti , bir başkasını ise yaraladı .
bu olay bizi derinden yaraladı .
belki türkiye 'nin hiçbir yerinde olmayan bir parkımız var .
adı japon parkı 'ydı .
bu parkımıza katledilen japon dostumuzun adını vereceğiz .
kurihara 'nın adını parkta yaşatacağız " diye konuştu.yaşanan olayın tüm türkiye 'yi hüzne boğduğunu , memleketin kalbine hançer gibi saplandığını belirten yıldız , olaydan dolayı japon halkından özür dilediklerini ifade etti.göreme beldesi zemi vadisi 'nde 9 eylül 'de yürüyüş yaparken bıçaklı saldırıya uğrayan iki japon turistten mai kurihara hayatını kaybetmiş , hoshie teramatsu ise yaralanmıştı .

ban ki-moon : assad si è macchiato di ‘ crimini contro l ’ umanità ’ - asia news & # 187 ; 14 / 09 / 2013 11 : 24siria – onu – russia – usaaccordo usa-russia ai negoziati sulle armi chimiche .
ban ki-moon : assad si è macchiato di ’ crimini contro l ’ umanità ’ kerry e lavrov uniti su un 'agenda che prevede entro una settimana la consegna dei dati sull 'arsenale posseduto da damasco .
entro novembre gli ispettori onu devono essere sul posto per la consegna .
il 16 settembre gli ispettori onu presentano il rapporto sul massacro di ghouta , dove sono state usate armi chimiche .
kerry incontra hollande e netanyahu.ginevra ( asianews ) - i negoziati sul destino delle armi chimiche della siria , in corso a ginevra fra russia e stati uniti , sono giunti a una conclusione comune .
intanto , secondo voci non confermate in modo ufficiale , ban ki-moon avrebbe detto che bashar assad si è macchiato di " crimini contro l 'umanità " .
il segretario di stato usa john kerry e il ministro russo degli esteri serghei lavrov si sono accordati su un 'agenda che prevede : entro una settimana , la siria deve consegnare tutti i dati sull 'arsenale da essa posseduti , con i luoghi dove essi sono immagazzinati ; entro i primi di novembre gli ispettori onu devono essere sul posto per verificare i luoghi e procedere alla consegna alla comunità internazionale ; entro la metà del 2014 l 'arsenale chimico deve essere distrutto .
l 'opera degli ispettori deve essere facilitata ( con cessate-il-fuoco ) dall 'esercito siriano e dai ribelli .
nel caso in cui la siria non obbedisce a tale agenda , vi sarebbe una risoluzione onu che minaccia sanzioni o l 'uso della forza .
kerry e lavrov erano in dialogo da tre giorni per vedere come attuare la proposta russa di consegnare e distruggere le armi chimiche possedute dalla siria .
secondo gli usa il piano doveva essere realizzato al più presto , ma la reale fattibilità rischiava di svolgersi in diversi mesi .
si stima che la siria abbia circa 1000 tonnellate di armi chimiche : la loro ricognizione , verifica , smaltimento e distruzione necessitano lunghi tempi tecnici.in ogni modo , l 'amministrazione usa apprezza ormaiquesta proposta , piuttosto che l 'azione militare minacciata dal presidente barack obama , che ha trovato poco sostegno nella comunità internazionale e in patria .
il 16 settembre gli ispettori onu presenteranno il rapporto sul massacro di ghouta , del 21 agosto , dove si sospetta siano state usate armi chimiche .
secondo gli usa le armi sono state usate da assad ; la siria ( e la russia ) affermano che esse sono state usate dai ribelli .
ieri ban ki-moon , durante un incontro , ha detto che il rapporto conferma che sono state usate armi chimiche .
gli ispettori onu non avevano il compito di scoprire il responsabile dell 'attacco .
ban non ha detto chi è il responsabile , ma ha affermato - forse riferendosi ad altri episodi della guerra - che bashar assad si è macchiato di " crimini contro l 'umanità " e sarà accusato quando il conflitto finirà .
in ogni caso , egli ha aggiunto , tocca al popolo siriano decidere di destituire assad .
subito dopo l 'incontro di ginevra , kerry si recherà a parigi e poi in israele .
il presidente francois hollande e il premier benjamin netanyahu sono fra i più decisi sostenitori di un 'azione militare contro la siria .
vedi anche26 / 08 / 2013 siria - onusiria , l 'onu lancia l 'inchiesta sulle armi chimiche .
la comunità internazionale si spacca07 / 05 / 2013 siria - onul 'onu frena sull 'uso di armi chimiche da parte dei ribelli06 / 05 / 2013 siria - onuun rapporto onu accusa i ribelli siriani di aver usato armi chimiche26 / 04 / 2013 siria-stati unitiuso di gas nervino , la cia accusa damasco13 / 09 / 2013 siria-onu-usa-russiakerry , lavrov , brahimi : dalle armi chimiche verso la conferenza di pace copyright © 2003 asianews c.f. 00889190153 tutti i diritti riservati : è permesso l 'uso personale dei contenuti di questo sito web solo a fini non commerciali .
l 'utilizzo per riprodurre , pubblicare , vendere e distribuire può avvenire solo previo accordo con l 'editore .
le foto presenti su asianews.it sono prese in larga parte da internet e quindi valutate di pubblico dominio .
se i soggetti o gli autori avessero qualcosa in contrario alla pubblicazione , non avranno che da segnalarlo alla redazione che provveder & agrave prontamente alla rimozione delle immagini utilizzate west hartford life the inauguration of the first section of contourglobal ’ s methane gas power plant on lake kivu is now scheduled for the end of march . l 'utilizzo per riprodurre , pubblicare , vendere e distribuire può avvenire solo previo accordo con l 'editore .
le foto presenti su asianews.it sono prese in larga parte da internet e quindi valutate di pubblico dominio .
se i soggetti o gli autori avessero qualcosa in contrario alla pubblicazione , non avranno che da segnalarlo alla redazione che provveder & agrave prontamente alla rimozione delle immagini utilizzate tariff | hieghts it & # 8217 ; s a good way to build your clip portfolio : in order to get a job in print or online journalism you need a strong clip portfolio , and writing for a community paper is a terrific way to do that .
as i said earlier , community papers typically use a lot of articles from freelancers , so if you & # 8217 ; re eager to work it & # 8217 ; s possible to rack up a lot of clips in a relatively short period of time .
next , interview a few people to collect quotes that reflect the public ’ s perception of the event or story .
don & # 8217 ; t be intimidated by the idea of interviewing important or newsworthy people !
an interview can be as formal or informal as you want to make it , so relax and have fun with it .
find a few people with strong opinions and write down the responses for accuracy .
also let the interviewee know that you will be quoting him or her .
3 .

please try again.subscribesearch ain alyaqeen m23 , les raisons d ’ une fissure et de la reddition de bosco ntaganda le 23 a éclaté en deux groupes qui se sont même affronté à l ’ arme lourde .
coup de théâtre ou réalité ?
des commentaires sont allés dans tous les sens .
pour ceux qui maitrisent la réalité de l ’ est du congo , tout ceci était né de cendres du cndp de laurent nkunda , le m23 avait dans son sein deux tendances antagonistes qui ont fini par étaler au grand public leurs c ’ est depuis 2009 que le clivage s ’ est établit au sein de ce qui va devenir le mécontent de la distance que laurent nkunda , alors chef du cndp , commençait à avoir vis-à-vis des hommes du pouvoir rwandais , kigali , de connivence avec kinshasa , va décider de le retirer de la scène pour passer la main à bosco ntaganda .
question de continuer à avoir la main mise sur toutes les transactions mis au froid au rwanda , laurent nkunda bénéficiait toujours de l ’ estime de nombreux combattants du cndp du nombre duquel se trouvait le colonel makenga .
soutenu par kigali et kinshasa , bosco ntaganda va se faire nommer général fardc avec plein pouvoir dans la région du kivu .
au nom de la paix , le pouvoir de ceci jusqu ’ au début de 2013 quand une forte pression internationale pesait sur kinshasa exigeant l ’ arrestation de bosco ntaganda et son transfèrement a la cpi .
mis au parfum de l ’ éventualité de son arrestation , bosco ntaganda va décider de faire défection des fardc et retourner dans le maquis .
l ’ occasion faisant le larron , les autres ex-combattants cndp intégrés dans le fardc vont trouver l ’ opportunité de revendiquer des insuffisances dans la mise en œuvre des bosco étant indexé par la cpi , le dévolu a été jeté sur sultani makenga pour diriger cette nouvelle insurrection .
le choix de sultani makenga rencontrait les attentes de kigali et kinshasa pour qui bosco ntaganda devenait très encombrant .
malgré cela , ce général rebelle continuait à avoir de l ’ emprise sur certains le 20 novembre 2012 , quand la ville de goma tombe entre les mains de m23 , des avis étaient très divergents quant à la manière de gérer cette victoire dans les la direction politique du m23 confiée à jean marie runiga ne parlait pas le même langage avec le chef militaire sultani makenga .
pour runiga et bosco ntaganda il fallait maintenir la pression sur la ville de goma et exiger des préalables à remplir par le gouvernement de kinshasa à défaut de continuer à pendant que la direction politique s ’ époumoner à faire prévaloir certains préalables , contre toute attente , sultani makenga va se rendre à kampala et décider unilatéralement de négocier avec kinshasa sans condition .
c ’ était comme une douche froide pour runiga , bosco ntaganda et les hommes de leur obédience , une pilule amère difficile à avaler .
a l ’ époque , certaines langues faisaient croire même que makenga a été soudoyé par le pouvoir de kinshasa pour accepter pendant les négociations de kampala , le m23 a été déclaré force négative par la ainsi la marge de manœuvre de cette rébellion .
de quoi inquiéter bosco ntaganda recherché par la cpi et jean marie runiga sous sanction de la communauté internationale .
la scission devenait donc impérieuse .
ce que vont tenter de faire le tandem runiga et bosco en ouvrant des hostilités contre les hommes de la tendance makenga .
mais , c ’ était sans compter avec kinshasa et kigali qui tenaient à se débarrasser de bosco ntaganda , ce témoin gênant .
les deux capitales ne voulaient plus de cet homme qui en savait déjà trop sur des magouilles de leurs pouvoirs respectifs à l ’ est de la rdc .
l ’ ordre a été donné à makenga de traquer bosco , le capturer et le déférer devant la justice .
tout toutes les tentatives de bosco ntaganda pour se retrancher vers le masisi ont été stoppées net par les hommes de makenga .
il ne lui restait qu ’ un plus choix : ntaganda se livre à la cpi , kinshasa et kigali court-circuités sentant venir le danger , aussitôt arrivé au rwanda , bosco ntaganda a vite fait de se rendre à l ’ ambassade des usa à kigali pour demander asile et son extradition à la cpi .
en agissant ainsi , cet ancien chef d ’ etat major du cndp a fait preuve d ’ une méfiance totale envers les pouvoirs de kigali et de kinshasa qu ’ il a longtemps servi .
l ’ homme redoutait même le pire pour sa vie .
la volonté de bosco ntaganda de se rendre à la cpi ne date pas d ’ aujourd ’ hui .
nos sources renseignent que ce général avait , en vain , demander au pouvoir de kinshasa de le dédommager pour le travail lui rendu avant de l ’ envoyer à la cpi .
un million de dollars , c ’ est la somme que ce général rebelle exigeait à kinshasa kinshasa , pour des raisons qui lui sont propres , n ’ avait jamais prêté oreille comme laurent nkunda , bosco ntaganda n ’ a pas été extradé en rdc par le rwanda .
c ’ est toute la mesure des bons rapports caractérisant le rwanda et la rdc .
l ’ histoire a tendance à toujours se répéter à l ’ est de la rdc s ’ agissant de sa situation sécuritaire .
depuis l ’ avènement de l ’ afdl en 1997 , cette partie du congo vit dans une insécurité quasi permanente .
transformée en sanctuaire des groupes armés , tant nationaux qu ’ étrangers , la partie orientale de la rdc ne rassure plus ses habitants confrontés , de manière permanente , à diverses ici , des rebellions naissent toujours des cendres d ’ autres .
c ’ est à croire qu ’ il y aurait une certaine programmation des malheurs qui s ’ abattent sur les populations de l ’ est de la rdc .
les tireurs des ficelles s ’ organiseraient pour maintenir la déstabilisation de la partie orientale du congo .
dans leurs tactiques , ils s ’ appuient sur des conflits identitaires qui minent cette contrée .
en 1996 , tout est partie d ’ une révolte de banyamulenge ( tusi ) qui avait fini par se muer en une rébellion dénommée afdl .
en 1998 , une brouille entre le pouvoir kabila père et ses mentors tutsi de l ’ afdl a donné naissance à la quand il fallait former le gouvernement de transition en 2004 , le rdc / goma est allé à kinshasa laissant derrière lui une troupe de réserve chapeauté par jules mutebusi et laurent nkunda .
c ’ est ce noyau laissé par le rcd qui a tout ceci porte à croire que la question de la survie tutsi en rdc préoccuperait plusieurs décideurs du monde au point qu ’ ils en feraient l ’ l ’ une des clés pour résoudre la question sécuritaire en rdc .
sinon , comment comprendre cette succession d ’ insurrection tutsi bénéficiant du soutien de certains milieux les clivages entre les différentes communautés linguistiques présentes dans la partie orientale du congo ainsi que la problématique d ’ exploitation des richesses naturelles de l ’ est du congo , sont d ’ autres raisons à la base de qu ’ adviendra-t-il après cette rébellion du m23 ?
plusieurs congolais ne in sawyer ’ s archives , scholars are also likely to find voluminous research notes .
“ one of the hallmarks of what [ robert j. sawyer ] does , ” she said , “ is to take on a topic and then do all the science reading and research behind that particular topic as he is preparing his novel or series . ”
for example , his most recent novel , red planet blues , discusses fossilization and paleontology on the planet mars .
to grisé , another distinctive quality of sawyer ’ s writing is his strong interest in ideas of interdisciplinarity .
“ what he is interested in is the way that science connects with ideas of humanity , religion , and philosophy , so that you get a richness , ” she said .
congratulations as well to the new members of the general assembly who were sworn in earlier today .
i look forward to working with you in the months and years ahead .
i ’ d like to recognize my wonderful wife cathy and my sons dannel and sam who join us today .
as i know is true for so many of you , i could not do my job without the tremendous love and support of my family .
what befell newtown is not something we thought possible in any of connecticut ’ s beautiful towns or cities .
and yet , in the midst of one of the worst days in our history , we also saw the best of our state .
as a state and as a community , we will continue to do everything we can for the families of newtown .
but we also must ask ourselves : what is our responsibility ?
to those we ’ ve lost , to one another , to our children , and to future generations ?
that is not who we are in connecticut , and it is not who we will allow ourselves to become .
there will be more to say in the weeks ahead , but let me be clear today : our focus will be first and foremost on protecting connecticut ’ s families .
my friends , as we begin this legislative session let us be guided by devotion to the common good , by faith in one another , and by a determination to work together to make our community as strong as it can be in every way .
the people of connecticut , the communities you represent , and all of us in this chamber – when tested , we met those challenges head on .
we did as our forefathers did , as our grandparents and parents taught us .
we decided to focus not on what makes us different , but on what makes us the same – our common humanity .
anyone who tells you that the budget we passed two years ago didn ’ t do its job , that it didn ’ t make real change in how we approach our finances , is simply not telling the truth .
we didn ’ t kick the can down the road – we picked it up .
we ’ ve all had to buckle down and make tough choices .
we ’ re going to make more of them in the weeks and months ahead .
it ’ s a good conversation to have , and it ’ s the right time to have it .
but a dialogue on the best way forward can ’ t be an excuse for standing still .
we see that too often in washington .
we ’ re off to a good start , but it ’ s only a start .
the key is making government an active partner rather than a bystander who watches markets develop elsewhere .
i say this not to demean any of our colleagues in washington but in the hope that we will better appreciate what we ’ ve accomplished here in connecticut .
we ’ ve come a long way in two years , and we ’ ve done it together – as a government , as a community , as a state .
in 2013 , let us honor one another , let us honor our renewed community , and let us honor those we ’ ve lost .
we have a great deal of work to do .
but if history is any judge , we will rise to the occasion .
may god bless you , may god bless the great state of connecticut , and may god bless the united states of america .
we gather today to mark the opening of the 2010 legislative session and we do so at a time of continued challenge , continued anxiety .
the combination of insecurity and drought is making it hard to get humanitarian aid to the area .

the middle east or mideast is a region that encompasses western asia and all of or part of northern africa , depending on the context .
the term is considered to be eurocentric and used as a synonym for near east , in opposition to far east .
the corresponding adjective is middle-eastern and the derived noun is middle-easterner .

[ 11 ] the discovery that failed to parse ( missing texvc executable ; please see math / readme to configure . ) : \ scriptstyle \ sqrt or failed to parse ( missing texvc executable ; please see math / readme to configure . ) : \ scriptstyle f ( x , y,z ) = w ^ 2 and failed to parse ( missing texvc executable ; please see math / readme to configure . ) : \ scriptstyle g _ 3 or quotients of polynomials ; this would be what is sought for if such failed to parse ( missing texvc executable ; please see math / readme to configure . ) : \ scriptstyle x , y , z if a and b are coprime , then failed to parse ( missing texvc executable ; please see math / readme to configure . ) : \ scriptstyle a ^ 2 + b ^ 2 for all failed to parse ( missing texvc executable ; please see math / readme to configure . ) : \ scriptstyle n \ geq 3 ( a fact completely beyond his methods ) appears only on his annotations on the margin of his copy of diophantus ; he never claimed this to others [ 47 ] and thus had no need to retract it if he found a mistake in his alleged proof. if and only if failed to parse ( missing texvc executable ; please see math / readme to configure . ) : \ scriptstyle p \ equiv 1 \ ; mod \ ; 4 in terms of its tools , as the study of the integers by means of tools from real and complex analysis ; [ 68 ] or and failed to parse ( missing texvc executable ; please see math / readme to configure . ) : b are rational numbers and failed to parse ( missing texvc executable ; please see math / readme to configure . ) : d can be factorised both as failed to parse ( missing texvc executable ; please see math / readme to configure . ) : \ scriptstyle 6 = 2 \ cdot 3 all of failed to parse ( missing texvc executable ; please see math / readme to configure . ) : 2 number fields are often studied as extensions of smaller number fields : a field l is said to be an extension of a field k if l contains k.
( for example , the complex numbers c are an extension of the reals r , and the reals r are an extension of the rationals q. )
classifying the possible extensions of a given number field is a difficult and partially open problem .
abelian extensions — that is , extensions l of k such that the galois group [ note 12 ] gal ( l / k ) of l over k is an abelian group — are relatively well understood .
their classification was the object of the programme of class field theory , which was initiated in the late 19th century ( partly by kronecker and eisenstein ) and carried out largely in 1900 — 1950 .
the central problem of diophantine geometry is to determine when a diophantine equation has solutions , and if it does , how many .
the approach taken is to think of the solutions of an equation as a geometric object. us a solution failed to parse ( missing texvc executable ; please see math / readme to configure . ) : x = a / c , failed to parse ( missing texvc executable ; please see math / readme to configure . ) : y = b / c the rephrasing of questions on equations in terms of points on curves turns out to be felicitous .
the finiteness or not of the number of rational or integer points on an algebraic curve — that is , rational or integer solutions to an equation failed to parse ( missing texvc executable ; please see math / readme to configure . ) : f ( x , y ) = 0 , where failed to parse ( missing texvc executable ; please see math / readme to configure . ) : f is a polynomial in two variables — turns out to depend crucially on the genus of the curve .
the genus can be defined as follows : [ note 13 ] allow the variables in failed to parse ( missing texvc executable ; please see math / readme to configure . ) : f ( x , y ) = 0 if failed to parse ( missing texvc executable ; please see math / readme to configure . ) : \ scriptstyle | x-a / q | < \ frac is an algebraic number .
if failed to parse ( missing texvc executable ; please see math / readme to configure . ) : x let failed to parse ( missing texvc executable ; please see math / readme to configure . ) : a be a set of integers .
consider the set failed to parse ( missing texvc executable ; please see math / readme to configure . ) : a + a consisting of all sums of two elements of failed to parse ( missing texvc executable ; please see math / readme to configure . ) : a , say ?
should it be possible to write large integers as sums of elements of failed to parse ( missing texvc executable ; please see math / readme to configure . ) : a ? and failed to parse ( missing texvc executable ; please see math / readme to configure . ) : a · failed to parse ( missing texvc executable ; please see math / readme to configure . ) : a two of the most popular introductions to the subject are : robson takes issue with the notion that the scribe who produced plimpton 322 ( who had to " work for a living " , and would not have belonged to a " leisured middle class " ) could have been motivated by his own " idle curiosity " in the absence of a " market for new mathematics " . ( robson 2001 , pp . & # 160 ; 199-200 ) method : if we count by threes and there is a remainder 2 , put down 140 .
if we count by fives and there is a remainder 3 , put down 63 .
if we count by sevens and there is a remainder 2 , put down 30 .
add them to obtain 233 and subtract 210 to get the answer .
if we count by threes and there is a remainder 1 , put down 70 .
if we count by fives and there is a remainder 1 , put down 21 .
if we count by sevens and there is a remainder 1 , put down 15 .
when [ a number ] exceeds 106 , the result is obtained by subtracting 105 . ^ perfect and especially amicable numbers are of little or no interest nowadays .
the same was not true in medieval times – whether in the west or the arab-speaking world – due in part to the importance given to them by the neopythagorean ( and hence mystical ) nicomachus ( ca .
100 ce ) , who wrote a primitive but influential " introduction to arithmetic " .
see van der waerden 1961 , ch .
iv . ^ see the comment on the importance of modularity in iwaniec & kowalski 2004 , p . & # 160 ; 1 becker , oskar ( 1936 ) .
" die lehre von geraden und ungeraden im neunten buch der euklidischen elemente " ( in german ) .
quellen und studien zur geschichte der mathematik , astronomie und physik .

geceyi emniyette geçiren yanardağ , sabah saatlerinde bodrum adliyesi 'ne sevk edildi.yanardağ , adliyeye girerken gazetecilerin sorular sorması üzerine , " boyun eğmeyeceğiz , mücadeleye devam edeceğiz .
özgürlükleri , hakkı hukuku savunmaya devam edeceğiz .
bu da geçecek .
çalışma için buraya gelmiştim , kitap hazırlığı içindeydim .
tam da kitabı bitirmiştim , yayınlanacaktı " dedi.yanardağ , polislerin kendisine gayet iyi davrandığını kaydetti.ergenekon davası kapsamında i̇stanbul 13 .
ağır ceza mahkemesi 'nce 10 yıl 6 ay hapis cezasına çarptırılan yanardağ , çıkarıldığı mahkemece " ergenekon silahlı terör örgütüne üye olmak ve hükumeti yıkmaya teşebbüs " suçlamasıyla tutuklandı.yoğun güvenlik önlemleri altında adliyeden çıkartılan yanardağ , bu sırada , " hukuken , ahlaken , vicdanen kararı doğru bulmuyorum .
toplumu , basını susturmaya ve sindirmeye yönelik bir karar bu .
kararı kınıyor ve protesto ediyorum " ifadelerini kullandı.yanardağ , bodrum devlet hastanesindeki sağlık kontrolünün ardından muğla cezaevi 'ne gönderildi.yanardağ 'ın avukatı muğla baro başkanı mustafa i̇lker gürkan , adliye önünde gazetecilere yaptığı açıklamada , yanardağ hakkında yakalama kararının yüze karşı okunması ve tutuklama kararı verilmesi yolunda i̇stanbul 'dan gelen talimatı bodrum mahkemesi 'nin icra ettiğini , müvekkilinin tutuklandığını söyledi.yanardağ 'ın , savcılığın takdirine göre cezanın üst sınırı yüksek olduğu için muğla cezaevi 'ne sevk edileceğini belirten gürkan , daha sonra adalet bakanlığının kendi içindeki yazışmalara göre i̇stanbul 'a nakledileceğini anlattı .
kaynak : yorumlartoplumsal haberler-diğermerdan yanardağ tutuklandıokul servisinde tespih sallanmayacakkapalı yolda 7 yılda 30 kazaailesi teramatsu 'yu ziyarete geldijapon geline karadeniz düğünüyht 'nin rengini vatandaş belirleyecekyolcu treni raydan çıktıtaksim ’ de trafik yerin altından akıyoralabora hakkında takipsizlik kararıi̇nönü stadı 'nda yangınözal davası başladıodtü yoluna durdurma davasıgezi gözaltıları davası başlıyoralkolde " yasak " başladıpkk çekilmeyi durdurdumamak cami ve cemevinin temeli atıldıkocaeli 'de orman yangınıakdamar kilisesi 'ndeki ayinsuriye sınırındaki askeri hareketlilik sürüyorlazkiye 'de orman yangını congo-kinshasa / tunisia : tp mazembe through to the semifinals of the 2013 caf confedration cup whom you set as head and shepherd of your church .

the northern cross - catechesis and apologeticsliz hoefferle : as individuals and family , we share mission of priestshow the ordained and laity carry out that mission differs , but has same threefold basethe diocese of duluth once again has the opportunity to rejoice as three young men will be ordained to the holy priesthood , with two more being ordained to the transitional diaconate during this month of june.through the sacrament of holy orders , they will be consecrated in christ ’ s name & ldquo ; to feed the church by the word and grace of god & rdquo ; ( lumen gentium 11 ) .we are truly blessed by the generous response of these young men , which allows us to be nourished by god ’ s word and to grow in his grace.priest , prophet and kingmen who have been called by god to serve as priests and thus receive the sacrament of holy orders are empowered to act as representatives of jesus christ and to carry out christ ’ s threefold mission as priest , prophet and king .
how much does it cost to advertise in the best times ?
if i buy advertising , will you accept my press releases or articles for publication ?
our rates are based on receipt of electronic files .
you may e-mail us your completed ad as a high-resolution ’ pdf ’ or ’ jpg ’ file .
you may also provide the file on a cd ad design assistance is available at $ 50 per hour , at a minimum of one our deadline for reserving space is the third day of the month preceding publication .
the deadline for final proof approval or submission of electronic files is the eighth day of the month preceding publication .
prepayment of the first ad insertion is due the third day of the month preceding publication , unless other arrangements are made .
subsequent insertions will be invoiced and due on the last day of the month of publication .
the best times accepts mastercard and visa. third day of the month .
if cancelled , the cost would be adjusted accordingly .
for example , if you had a 12-time agreement for a quarter-page you would be invoiced for the difference between the three-time and 12 time yes .
you may change your ad each month .
we must receive notification of a pending ad change by the fifth of the month .
we am i restricted in what i can advertise in the best times ?
yes , businesses may have an ad flier or other insert included in the best we can also arrange the printing of fliers for inserting .
for printing and " at your service " is an option for advertisers who don 't find display ads and classified ads to be quite the right fit .
the " at your the cost of an at your service business card ad is an affordable $ 200 per we 've made it easy on you by eliminating the need for a contract .

abe elected as new premierthe parliament has elected conservative shinzo abe as the nation 's new prime minister by 339 of 475 votes flight information is provided by flightstats , and is subject to the flightstats terms of use. class = " menu men siria-onu-usa-russia kerry , lavrov , brahimi : dalle armi chimiche verso la conferenza di pace - asia news & # 187 ; 13 / 09 / 2013 14 : 52siria-onu-usa-russiakerry , lavrov , brahimi : dalle armi chimiche verso la conferenza di paceil segretario di stato usa e il ministro russo degli esteri trovano un " terreno comune " e programmano incontri per attuare il processo di pace .
la siria ha firmato la convenzione onu sulle armi chimiche .
assad : anche le altre nazioni devono fermare il rifornimento di armi chimiche ai ribelli .
la coalizione nazionale dell 'opposizione " scettica " sul piano russo-siriano .
ginevra ( asianews / agenzie ) - il segretario di stato usa , john kerry , e il ministro russo degli esteri , serghei lavrov hanno deciso di incontrarsi di nuovo verso la fine del mese per fissare la data di una tanto attesa conferenza di pace sulla siria .
kerry e lavrov sono nella città svizzera per rendere concreta la proposta russa di sottomettere alla comunità internazionale e poi distruggere l 'armamentario chimico posseduto da damasco .
parlando stamane a una conferenza stampa congiunta , kerry ha detto : " siamo d 'accordo ... di incontrarci ancora a new york , verso il 28 [ settembre ] , durante il periodo dell 'assemblea generale dell 'onu , per vedere se è possibile trovare una data per quella conferenza " .
alla conferenza stampa era presente lahdar brahimi , inviato dell 'onu e della lega araba che da mesi spinge i membri del consiglio di sicurezza al dialogo per un cessate-il-fuoco e per una conferenza di pace con tutti gli attori del dramma siriano .
solo una settimana fa un attacco militare degli stati uniti - con l 'appoggio di francia , turchia , arabia saudita , qatar - sembrava imminente .
il motivo era che damasco , in un bombardamento del 21 agosto , aveva usato armi chimiche contro il suo popolo .
la denuncia era venuta dopo una serie di video postati dai ribelli su internet .
damasco ha sempre negato di aver usato le armi chimiche e attribuisce le responsabilità ai ribelli , interessati a fermare il processo di pace .
proprio verso la fine di agosto doveva tenersi il ginevra ii , per preparare la conferenza di pace .
il poco appoggio ricevuto da opinione pubblica e da parlamentari usa ; la grande eco suscitata dalla veglia per la pace di papa francesco in piazza san pietro ; la freddezza della maggioranza delle altre diplomazie mondiali ha spinto il presidente barack obama a toni più pazienti .
allo stesso tempo , la proposta di lavrov - che la siria avrebbe consegnato le armi chimiche alla comunità internazionale per farle distruggere - ha disinnescato la minaccia militare che seppure " breve , mirata ed efficace " , avrebbe condotto il medio oriente a un lungo periodo di instabilità e di guerra .
kerry e lavrov lavorano ancora oggi per una soluzione viabile al problema delle armi chimiche , ma si nota un " terreno comune " per una soluzione politica del conflitto .
i problemi però non sono finiti .
ieri la siria ha presentato domanda per firmare la convenzione onu per il bando delle armi chimiche .
la convenzione permette un periodo di 30 giorni per sottomettere all 'organismo i dati sull 'arsenale posseduto ( e da distruggere ) .
kerry ha però affermato che 30 giorni sono troppi .
da parte sua , bashar assad , in un 'intervista alla televisione russa , ha dichiarato che " la siria accetta , se l 'america la smette con le minacce militari e se altre nazioni , che riforniscono i ribelli di armi chimiche , rispetteranno la convenzione " .
da parte sua , la coalizione dell 'opposizione si dichiara " scettica " sul piano russo accettato da damasco .
" tale gesto - si legge in una dichiarazione di ieri - arriva come [ una cosa ] troppo piccola , troppo tardi che salvare i civili dall 'intento assassino del regime ed è con chiarezza un tentativo di sfuggire all 'azione internazionale e alle responsabilità davanti al popolo siriano " .invia ad un amico visualizza per la stampa vedi anche07 / 09 / 2013 vaticanola giornata di preghiera e digiuno per la pace in siria11 / 09 / 2013 siria-usa- russiaobama ritarda l 'attacco alla siria , e concede tempo alla russia e a se stesso12 / 09 / 2013 siria-usa-russiaputin scrive all 'america .
kerry e lavrov a ginevra10 / 09 / 2013 siria-usa- russiaobama frena sull 'attacco dopo la proposta della russia di consegnare tutte le armi chimiche di damasco05 / 09 / 2013 siria - usa-vaticanovescovi usa a obama : no all 'attacco militare in siria copyright © 2003 asianews c.f. 00889190153 tutti i diritti riservati : è permesso l 'uso personale dei contenuti di questo sito web solo a fini non commerciali .
l 'utilizzo per riprodurre , pubblicare , vendere e distribuire può avvenire solo previo accordo con l 'editore .
le foto presenti su asianews.it sono prese in larga parte da internet e quindi valutate di pubblico dominio .

chili - le 11 septembre 1973 , un coup d 'etat renversait le gouvernement de salvador allende .
40 ans après , le chili a bien changé .
a tel point qu 'il est difficile d 'imaginer ce qu 'étaient les rêves de salvador allende un demi siècle plus tard .
lui-même ne reconnaîtrait pas son pays .
après le socialisme en démocratie , le chili a connu la dérégulation économique en dictature .
enseignant à science po et chercheur à l 'institut universitaire européen de florence révoltes arabes - la configuration absolument inédite qui prévaut au sein des sociétés arabes depuis 2010 interdit de manière catégorique de privilégier une grille de lecture religieuse pour expliquer les logiques de contestation .
la dynamique est incontestablement " verticale " et non " horizontale " .
littérature - dans l 'article huffpost maghreb sur la rentrée littéraire , monsieur jean fontaine a déclaré : " aujourd 'hui , la littérature tunisienne , ça n 'intéresse plus personne ( ... ) .
la maison d 'édition cérès , par exemple , ne veut plus publier de littérature parce que la politique , ça rapporte plus ! "
raccourci un peu rapide !
pourquoi faut-il que , chaque fois qu 'un auteur se voit refuser une publication , il se croit obligé de régler cela sur la place publique ?
rentrée - la dernière année scolaire et universitaire a vu défiler bien des surprises .
égrenons donc le souvenir de ces événements qui ont été , pour certains , pénibles et pleins d 'émotion , joyeux , mais teintés d 'une touche de tristesse pour d 'autres .
dans une tribune publiée ( et désormais retirée ) sur votre page facebook , écrite dans un français très approximatif ( les fans de sonia toumia apprécieront ) , vous vous en prenez à om zied , coupable du crime de lèse-majesté qui consiste à contester la présence de votre chef de parti ( et accessoirement géniteur ) lors de la commémoration du quarantième jour du martyr mohamed brahmi .
a la lecture de ce billet , deux sentiments se sont emparés de moi : l 'indignation et la gratitude .
éducation - l 'éducation doit se présenter comme l 'une des principales composantes de la tunisie post-révolutionnaire qui se doit de cibler la formation de cadres capables de contribuer à l 'émergence et au développement global de la nation .
littérature - nombre de jeunes auteurs algériens d 'expression arabophone s 'imaginent progressistes , subversifs , mais leurs écrits demeurent pudiques , conformistes , loin de remettre en cause les différents codes sociaux et politiques qui régissent la société dans laquelle ils vivent .
intervention en syrie - ces derniers temps , on me demande comment je peux être en faveur d 'une intervention militaire contre le régime assad alors qu 'il y a 42 ans , je militais activement contre la guerre du vietnam .
la réponse est simple : en 1971 , je m 'exprimais avec ma conscience , tout comme je le fais actuellement , en 2013 .

it is very hard to get a gun permit to defend yourself in belize , unlike panama , and if you kill a bandido , you are likely to go to jail while its all sorted out .
drug traffickers roam the islands and placencia peninsula with impunity and belizeans are law abiding , but the ratio of gangbangers ( from belize from the usa ) and the guatemalan bandidos is too high for anyone to be safe .

want to go off-grid ?
be prepared to pay 75-100 % this is all true , and i know what i am talking about .
if you want to the mmmf is on thursday , dec 30 , and so i start getting betsy ready for the trip on tuesday .
the low beams have stopped working .
i unplug & replug a couple of circuit plugs and check a couple of fuses and everything just goes haywire !
on top of that , betsy is not running well , stumbles allot in first and second gear .
i find that the rubber mount for the fuel pump has disintegrated so i make a nice new one out of a piece of bicycle innertube .
the fuel worrying that i might not get a meal before the festival , i stop at caesar 's place for a hamburger .
caesar is a wonderful ( south african ) drummer who has a couple of wood craft shops ( he makes the crafts , beautiful wood sculptures & appliances ) and he is gone , opening a new shop in san pedro .
and , he is going to play new years at a high-toned place on the north end of san pedro .
of course i 'm envious , but i 've got a festival to play , so i cut and run for hillview and get there about 2pm .
the festival is scheduled to start at 3pm and so i set up my speakers , pa amplifier , mikes , and a couple of little guitar amps .
ray tells me that the marimba players a ) have been delayed and b ) he has to go get the marimba in his pickup .
i use this opportunity to take a nap ! ! .
before the marimba arrives , i play a couple of tunes just to " open the show " and then we wait for the marimba .
when it arrives , i am astounded .
i have seen marimbas before , little ones , big concert grand ones , but this is humongous ! !
eight feet long , instead of pipes on the bottom , it has cubical wooden resonators at the bass end .
it is played by four players .
two , on the right , play " the right hand " .
two on the left play " the left hand " -- the " stride " part in barrelhouse piano. here , but it is not as fancy as the one these guys had .
theirs has " alma belicena " in big letters on the front , and they are the " alma belicina marimba band . "
( i think that means " our belizeans " ) the bass bars are about 16 " long , and of course , there are two rows -- " black keys & white keys " -- altho these are all the same rich mahogany color . * time by topictrecut şi prezent în politica externa românească | cadran politic home idei contemporane trecut şi prezent în politica externa românească posted by florin constantiniu on mar 25th , 2003 / / comments off istoria românilor alatura exemple de uluitor curaj si de totala neîncredere în fortele proprii istoria românilor alatura exemple de uluitor curaj si de totala neîncredere în fortele proprii .
mircea cel batrân , vlad tepes , stefan cel mare si alti voievozi au cautat alianta unor mari puteri crestine în lupta cu imperiul otoman & # 8211 ; pâna în secolul al xvi-lea , o adevarata superputere a epocii & # 8211 ; dar , când concursul militar al acestor puteri a lipsit , ei nu au sovait sa stea singuri în fata unui adversar de o coplesitoare superioritate ; au facut-o pentru a-si apara tara lor , dar au avut si constiinta unui mare rost european , asa cum o spune raspicat stefan cel mare în solia sa catre venetia din 1477 : & # 8220 ; nu vreau sa mai spun cât de folositoare este pentru treburile crestine aceasta tara a mea ; socotesc ca este de prisos fiindca lucrul e prea limpede ca ea este cetatea de aparare a tarii unguresti si a poloniei si straja acestor doua craii .
afara de aceasta , fiindca turcul s-a împiedicat de mine , multi crestini au ramas în liniste de patru ani & # 8221 ; .
când soarta armelor nu le-a fost favorabila , ei nu s-au descurajat , asa cum reiese si din inscriptia pusa de acelasi stefan la biserica din razboieni , ridicata în 1496 , acolo unde fusese înfrânt cu douazeci de ani înainte de sultanul mehmed al ii-lea : & # 8220 ; s-a ridicat prea puternicul mahmet , împarat turcesc , cu toate puterile sale rasaritene ; si înca si basarab voievod , numit laiota , a venit cu el , cu toata tara basarabeasca ( tara româneasca , numita astfel dupa dinastia basarabilor & # 8211 ; n.n. ) .
si au venit sa prade si sa ia tara moldovei ; si au ajuns pâna aici , la locul numit valea alba .
iar noi , stefan voievod si cu fiul nostru alexandru , am iesit înaintea lor si am facut mare razboi cu ei , în luna iulie 26 ; si cu voia lui dumnezeu , au fost înfrânti crestinii de pagâni .
si au cazut aici multime mare de osteni ai moldovei .
tot atunci si tatarii au lovit tara moldovei din ceia parte & # 8221 ; .
relatarea atât e obiectiva a unui esec & # 8211 ; sa recunoastem & # 8211 ; este cu totul rara la oamenii politici .
în alte împrejurari se constata o adevarata spaima când este evocata posibilitatea unei confruntari cu poarta otomana .
astfel , în 1658 , când domnul tarii românesti , mihnea al iii-lea ( era grec ! ) , le propune boierilor sa se ridice împotriva imperiului otoman , acestia vadesc o totala lipsa de încredere în victorie : & # 8220 ; doamne , bun lucru ar fi acesta !
iar noi ne temem ca nu vom putea plini desavârsit , ci numai vom zadarî sarpele si ne va înghiti cu totul .
caci noi sântem o tara mica si far de oameni , neputincioasa si far de ajutor de nici o parte .
iar turcii sunt puternici , mari si biruiesc toata lumea , de la rasarit la apus & # 8221 ; .
nimic din curajul lui stefan cel mare !
aceeasi gândire politica , exprimata în termeni similari de unul dintre cei mai vârstnici oameni politici români , în 1914 , theodor rosetti , cumnatul lui cuza voda , care , în consiliul de coroana de la sinaia , convocat pentru a fixa atitudinea româniei în razboiul ce tocmai izbucnise , a spus : & # 8220 ; suntem o tara mica , un biet popor , iesit abia de ieri , de alaltaieri , din greutati si din robie .
nu cred ca sta în putinta noastra sa facem politica mare .
acum cei mari s-au încaierat , noi nu avem ce cauta în luptele lor .
sa stam deci linistiti la o parte , sa ne vedem de nevoile si de necazurile noastre si sa ne caznim sa pastram ceea ce cu atâta truda am agonisit & # 8221 ; .
cine urmareste politica externa a româniei în perioada post-decembrista , constata ca ea este dominata de felul de a gândi al boierilor munteni de la 1658 sau & # 8211 ; pâna la un punct & # 8211 ; al lui theodor rosetti , la 1914 .
întocmai ca si dupa primul razboi mondial , când garantiile de securitate au fost cautate cu precadere în exterior ( franta si anglia , mica întelegere , întelegerea balcanica , alianta româno-polona ) , si astazi , se crede ca garantiile de securitate vin din includerea româniei în nato .
doua observatii sunt aici de facut : 1 ) .
nato din perioada post-comunista , nu mai este nato din perioada razboiului rece ; disparitia amenintarii sovietice a lasat teren liber de manifestare a divergentelor si tensiunilor dintre aliati .
încordarea dintre sua si & # 8220 ; vechea europa & # 8221 ; ( franta , germania ) este o dovada graitoare ; 2 ) .
cine ameninta românia în momentul de fata ?
cu bulgaria si ungaria nu mai avem nici un litigiu teritorial ; ucrainei , tratatul din 1997 i-a dat teritorii românesti , la care probabil , nici nu visa ; rusia nu mai este vecina cu românia .
atunci ? & # 8220 ; noile amenintari & # 8221 ; ?
terorismul ?
în realitate , prin urmarea orbeasca a sua , românia se expune loviturilor teroriste .
retorica propagandei americane vrea sa acrediteze ideea ca , în prezent , are loc o confruntare între lumea civilizata si terorism .
nu este adevarat .
terorismul islamic este o componenta a conflictului din orientul mijlociu , iar ostilitatea sa fata de sua , o consecinta a pozitiei adoptate de sua în acest conflict , pozitie perceputa de fundamentalistii islamici ca antiaraba si antiislamica .
în conditiile unei confruntari asimetrice , partea slaba recurge la mijloace neconventionale de lupta , în speta acte teroriste .
din dorinta de a fi admisi în nato , am sacrificat ucrainei teritorii românesti la care kievul nu avea nici un drept .
atunci , în 1997 , sua s-au opus intrarii româniei în nato .
dupa 11 septembrie 2001 , interesat sa transforme nato într-un simplu instrument al politicii externe a sua si sa-si extinda controlul asupra unui numar cât mai mare de tari , washingtonul si-a aruncat privirile si asupra româniei .
guvernantii de la bucuresti , nesiguri de ei , apasati de banuiala de neo- sau criptocomunism , aveau nevoie de o legitimare din partea serifului mondial , sua .
au alergat în întâmpinarea dorintelor lui cu un servilism de prost gust , care a compromis tara noastra .
în jelania sa , theodor rosetti spunea ca românia nu trebuie sa se amestece în certurile dintre cei mari .
guvernantii nostri , tematori ca si theodor rosetti , n-au mers cu logica fricii pâna la capat : mai simplu spus , & # 8220 ; sa stea în banca lor & # 8221 ; .
nu , în dorinta de a fi pe placul washingtonului si a primului lor vasal , marea britanie , au criticat pozitia rationala a frantei .
ei nu înteleg ca , pentru o tara ca românia , coordonatele securitatii sunt un sistem multipolar sanatos si o institutie care sa impuna respectul legalitatii internationale .
activitatea politica si diplomatica a tarii noastre în ultimul timp pare a voi sa ilustreze afirmatia lui emil cioran : & # 8220 ; a fi român înseamna a fi o fiinta cu multa apa în sânge & # 8221 ; . © 2003 cadran politic · rss · designed by theme junkie · powered by wordpresschina ’ s newly rich - the washington post as china increases in wealth , more people are turning to luxuries such as cosmetic surgery .

grâce à une alliance avec la presse canadienne , marketwired est le seul distributeur de communiqués qui profite , pour la transmission de vos communiqués , de l ’ accès exclusif au même réseau que la presse canadienne utilise pour envoyer ses nouvelles directement aux systèmes éditoriaux de plus de 600 journaux , stations de radio et de télévision et sites internet à travers le canada.la livraison garantie de marketwired permet aux médias canadiens d ’ avoir accès facilement à vos nouvelles dans un format qui leur est familier , augmentant ainsi les chances que votre message soit vu par le plus grand nombre possible de journalistes.plus de contrôle pour vous assurer la tranquillité d ’ espritla série complète de solutions de distribution vous offre la flexibilité de choisir un service complet ou une option de libre service . vous pouvez vous fier aux services des représentants de marketwired pour transmettre vos communiqués ou profiter à moindre coût du service complètement automatisé de pr direct.pr direct vous fournit un accès 24 / 7 à votre propre compte internet sécurisé , vous donnant la possibilité de préparer votre communiqué , de l ’ envoyer directement de votre ordinateur au réseau de la presse canadienne et de rejoindre les médias en quelques minutes . envoyez une photo avec votre communiqué .
la presse canadienne fournit un service de distribution de photos aux médias et un service d ’ affectation photo avec des photographes qui se spécialisent dans la photo de presse , augmentant vos chances d ’ intéresser les médias .

nouvelles sur commande est le seul service en temps réel qui vous permet de surveiller le fil de la presse canadienne et d ’ être alerté instantanément des nouvelles avant qu ’ elles deviennent des manchettes .

a smart and principled plan to end ' too big to fail ' scams and thefts are nothing new at thailands busy airport but be on the lookout as over the last year there have been many robberies , lost property , thefts and taxi scams and these continue to happen .
following the inside thefts of airport trolleys last year the authorities have beefed up the security at the airport .
however there are foreigners and thais who still ply their trade by trying to take what is not theres so watch out and keep your bags safe .
make sure all your valuables are in a safe place and do not leave cameras , passports , valuables etc in your main bags even in the left luggage-- you risk losing them and theres no comeback .
with the world crises & internal headaches biting into thailands economy there has been an upsurge bank robberies in bangkok and even at suvannabhumbi airport so you are warned to beware .
it is up to you to stay safe but we publish items for the unwary traveller as the airport security can still not get their act together although the govt have taken steps to evict around 400 taxis which is a good sign as at september 2009 .
my dept secretary informed on this .
her cousin was detained in bangkok for stealing a box of cigarettes in a duty-free shop in bangkok international airport .
he had paid for chocolates and a carton of cigarettes .
the cashier put a packet of smokes into his bag and he thought it was a free pack .
he was arrested for shop-lifting and the thai police extortion price was rm30,000 for his release .
he spent two nights in jail and paid rm50 for an air-cond cell , 200-300 baht for each visitor , and rm11,000 for his final release .
now would you belive this scam ? ? ? as it was on tv nation channel 13th august ?
a thai man went in a taxi from the airport in the back of the taxi .
the driver has doctored the aircondition in the car to make the passenger 9 / .
the old saying --- if they speak good english be on alert .
don 't take shortcuts as it may lead to costing you a lot more than you thought .
men in uniform can buys these easy--ask for id and get them to write their name and sight their id number .
yell to get attention but don 't give in ?

careful examination one may see how a video may have been changed as its very easy to do to suit the situation after the fact ? http : / / www.kingpower.com / 2009 / index.php 6 / .

ces données ont été élaborées en coopération entre le centre d 'études et de recherches sur les qualifications ( céreq ) , l 'insee et les ministères chargés de l 'éducation nationale et de l 'emploi .
recensement de la population : trois nouvelles fiches conseil sont en ligne elles concernent les déplacements domicile-études , les déplacements domicile-travail et les variables de nature conjoncturelle en complément de l 'étude sur la " répartition géographique des emplois " ( insee première n ° 1278 ) , base de données communale et méthodologie détaillée .
estimation de la population au 1er janvier par région , département , sexe et âge , 1990-2008 toutes les séries longues depuis 1946 sur la population , les naissances , les mariages et les décès .
données extraites des ouvrages publiés par la statistique générale de la france ( sgf ) sur les recensements de la population , la démographie et l 'enseignement primaire , entre 1800 et 1925 .
ces données ont été saisies dans les années 1980 par une équipe de chercheurs franco-américains à l 'inter-university consortium for political and social research ( icpsr ) , situé à ann arbor , michigan , états-unis .
l 'essentiel des définitions des concepts les plus souvent utilisés dans les enquêtes et études de l 'insee a été traduit en anglais ( rubrique " définitions et méthodes " ) .
les bases de données au niveau des quartiers iris sont disponibles .
pour se conformer aux évolutions réglementaires , la nomenclature des catégories juridiques a été modifiée dans le répertoire sirene à compter de décembre 2009 .
performances économiques et progrès social - les suites du rapport stiglitz l 'insee et le service statistique public précisent leur plan d 'actions et présentent leurs premières contributions .
état civil - naissances et décès par commune , département et région , mariages par département et région mise à jour des statistiques annuelles de décès par commune et de mariages par département , dressées à partir des bulletins statistiques de l 'état civil .

les bases de données " flux de mobilité " et les fichiers détail anonymisés sont disponibles .
ces fichiers donnent la répartition par commune , au 1er janvier 2008 , des établissements selon l 'activité principale exercée en nes 16 , la classe d 'effectifs salariés , et les créations d 'établissements par commune , en 2008 , 2007 et 2006 , selon l 'activité principale exercée ( regroupement de la nomenclature economique de synthèse nes en 4 postes ) .
les taux de chômage localisés par zone d 'emploi sont disponibles pour le 2ème trimestre 2009 .
pour chaque région , ces comptes décrivent les dépenses et les recettes en 2006 des collectivités locales et des organismes divers d 'administration locale ( odal ) .
la version 2008 du fichier détail propose un décompte actualisé au niveau communal de quelque 1 700 000 équipements .
le rapport d 'activité permet de bien comprendre l 'élaboration des statistiques de l 'insee .

le fichier détail de données historiques des recensements de la population contient une sélection d 'informations extraites des cinq recensements réalisés en métropole entre 1968 et 1999 .
il contient des caractéristiques individuelles de la population , localisées au niveau départemental .
pour connaître le nombre d 'habitants d 'un territoire , la source statistique de référence est le recensement de la population .
la méthode mise en  uvre depuis 2004 permet d 'actualiser chaque année les populations légales de toutes les circonscriptions administratives , actualisation particulièrement importante compte tenu des évolutions rapides de la société .
les populations au 1er janvier 2006 ont ainsi été publiées le 31 décembre 2008 ; les populations 2007 seront publiées fin 2009 .

ils entreront en vigueur à partir du 1er janvier 2009 et seront actualisés chaque année .

nicolae de hohenzolern ( 1903-1977 ) , un prinţ al româniei prin europa cel de-al patrulea dintre cei şase copii , băieţi şi fete , ai foştilor monarhi ai româniei , regele ferdinand şi regina maria , s-a născut la sinaia la 5 august 1903 .
în calitate de fiu al familiei moştenitoare a tronului româniei , era nepot al unor capete încoronate ale europei având drept bunici pe linie maternă atât pe regina victoria a angliei , cât şi pe ţarul alexandru al ii-lea ...

egypt 's morsi ' abducted by army 'the family of the ousted egyptian president mohammed morsi has accused the army of abducting him not a rottweiler .
" chino " kuylen and his dad raise rottweilers .
chino is my butane deliveryman and i told him that i needed a dog " with feet as big as snowshoes . "
i don 't think he 's ever seen a pair of snowshoes , but he knew what i was talking about .
charlotte won 't let me get a rottweiler , but chino told me that he sometimes had mixes .
he came to me in february and said he had a new litter that was mostly labrador retriever ; mother lab , father was half rottweiler .
we negotiated a price ( he wanted to give me one , and i wanted to pay ) and then i didn 't hear anything for a long time .
finally , he asked me if i wanted male or female , i said " female " and he said that he would bring one over the next day .
next day , he showed up with a little black male puppy that looked like it was about to die !
i paid him ( a deal is a deal ) and we rushed the dog down to doctor sheila , our feisty vet on the other end of town .
she said he had tick fever , was covered with fleas and full of worms , so she wormed him , " fleed him " and gave us antibiotics to give him for a fortnight .
that night , he was very lonesome , very listless , but the next day he was feeling frisky and has been irrepressibly energetic ever since .
news : i took brutus down to the bay today , and he was afraid of the water .
who ever heard of a labrador retriever that was afraid of the water ?
i will put on a bathing suit and take him in with me , i guess .
it worked for my kids. water , but he loves to play with other dogs , and he is he is getting a lot bigger so he can hold his own with ( july 2003 ) brutus has grown up and you can see him here , cold in arkansas , and learning to be a lake swimmer .

defying us courts , argentine congress approves swapping new bonds for defaulted debts ( 9 / 12 / 2013 3 : 23 : 14 pm ) is one of the ancient games played in afghanistan .
the name of this game is perhaps on the basis of popular beliefs and legends , one could say this game was played for the first time in the oxus basin .
our people had earlier domisticated the horse and used to law inscribed on bull 's hide in gold and hung it on the gates of bactria .
according to subject-matter is the horse , one should say that two types of horses are more wellknown in afghanistan : one is the " qataghani " type which is smaller in size but strong and sturdy , the other raised in the steppes of faryab and balkh is larger.both types are used the horseman snatches the careas of a calf as they have already learned the tricks .
the hungry for part of the day and rides it daily a fairly long distance .
this is meant to blond horse is referred to as " samand " , a red one as " jayran " and a could say horsemanship in afghanistan was customary during the vedic times .
the people in the oxus basin had domisticated the horse in order to defend their homeeland against the fighting on horseback was discontinued , the horse come to be used as a means of transport in the first place and a vehidle to play bozkashi in the second. bozkashi because usually a hand to hand fightfollowed a cavalary campaign .
a horseman had to be strong and adept enough to beat his opponents on the ground as well .
now wrestling is considered as an ancient game like bozkashi and it is done in sunny days of spring .
it to unwritten rules of the fames .
for instance , one cannot hold one 's opponents by the leg latter displayed their mettle as adept horsemen and wrestlers .
so bozkashi may be regarded baghlan , samangan , jozjan , and faryab are good bozkashilayers and is is played on special only in summer to celebrate weddings but elsewhere , there is no set time. bozkashi is usually , a calf is beheaded , its four legs are cut off from the knee , its insides emptied most of the bozkashi horses belong to rich men who can afford to buy them and hire horseman can get any horses they lay their hands upon to use in a bozkashi match. game , nobody can tie the carcase of his saddle or hit his opponent on the hand to snatch may take up to a week till a particular team is annonunced the winner , a horse race is skul fracture , bleeding hands , a cut in the ear , broken nose or a cut in the lips does not sharon fends off leadership pollisraeli prime minister has narrowly defeated a move to challenge of the likud by holding an early election uk pm to promise eu referendumdavid cameron is to promise an in / out referendum on the eu if the conservatives win the next election poll result set to standprodi looks set to be confirmed as the winner of general election after the number of contested ballots was lowered prodi rules out eu resignationseuropean commission president has said there is no need for any members of his team to resign over fraud at eurostat prodi calls for eu unity on terrormeasures taken in the war against terror have shown eu had been able to act collectively woods looks like his old self with win at doral map of doral floridatiger woods earned his 76th career pga tour title with a two-shot victory at doral tiger owner of all majorswoods becomes the first golfer to hold all 4 major titles at the same time .
he held off duval and mickelson to win the masters the war was between a government dominated by arab muslims against black christians or animists in the south .
the extreme dryness of the air causes any heat that is radiated back into the atmosphere to be lost instead of being absorbed by the water vapor in the atmosphere .
the source of this energy is the sun , and because its heating effect is greater at the equator than at the poles , it creates a circulation in the atmosphere .
hot moist air rises over the equator and flows at a high level towards the poles , where it cools and sinks .
the equator is therefore a region of low pressure , and the poles are regions of high pressure .
the atmosphere is not a closed system .
it interacts with the land , the ocean , and the ice ; and the ice in turn interacts with the ocean.winds create currents in the ocean .
the annual cycle of freezing and melting of the sea ice around antarctica creates a vertical circulation in the ocean .
" antarctica is the coldest , highest , windiest , driest , and iciest continent on earth " by gas , i meant propane or butane .
( is that what you had in mind ? ? )
the belize postal service is not the usps , but it 's not too bad , and it 's getting better all the time .
you can get a po box if you live out of town , and they will deliver mail to you locally if they know where you live , and if you put your name and address on the outside of your house .
you have to go pick up packages , and there is a little " inspection fee " ( about a dollah ) to pay , and perhaps some duty and taxes , particularly if the package is insured .
( they will charge you a percentage of the insured amount . )
marlene , one of the more visible local gringas , had her daughter send her an electric percolator , and the daughter innocently listed the value at $ 50 .
that 's 100 dollahs , and marlene wound up paying more in duty and tax than her daughter did for the btl has a very extensive cel phone network , and there is a new competitor , previous to 2003 , btl had a 15-year monopoly on all telecommunications in and out of the country , with a few special exceptions .
their licence ( not a contract ) ashcroft , a brit and naturalized belizean citizen .

if you have an old number , you can convert it here.this is a clue to the age of a website that you are looking at .

china to blame over yasuni say criticsdeutsche welle 12 : 22 13-sep-13 how to get there : from suvannabhumi airport , bangkok , buses leave all the time for pattaya and cost 173 baht to jomtien or & cost 200 baht to the bus tgerminal on pattaya north rd .
avis offer a limo service for 2,200 or take a train from pattaya to bangkok 33 baht then hop on the overnight to the police can 't or won 't help you if you hire a jet ski then you sink it or turn sharply and it fills up with water .
the motto in thailand " whatever you hire whatever is damaged stolen or lost , you pay " so you hire a bike , or jetski at your own risk .
you can however negotiate a lesser amount which you are nuts if you don 't do but never say you will pay as then the price remians the same or can now go higher .
to hire a jet ski can cost you around 800baht per 1 / 2 hour but in september 2009 they want 1000baht per 1 / 2 hour .
good fun but don 't hit anyone swimming or damage the jetski as it will cost you .
there is no such thing as insurance for jet ski hire so you do so knowing if something goes wrong you pay .
if you blow the motor then its your fault so remember these things if youre game enough to rent one .
for my money stay clear of the damn things & there is a scam at the moment as times are tight at the moment .
as you will find when it happens to you hiring a jetski can be bliss or a nightmare .
many of the jetskis are thrashed by their thai owners and they can be bought second hand at jssr auction for 100,000baht or so .
but most people who hire them are never asked to see a check sheet of damage or any dents rips etc in the coulings etc so once you bring it back the nice ride can turn into a nightmare .
some times the thais will not even let you leave the beach but as you have no money you demand to see a tourist police .
in pattaya they have 2 foreigners on hand at the beach rd police station .
insist on it or send someone to bring them back ?
these jetskis in pattaya & phuket are thrashed and when they start using oil its easy to drain them and let you hire it ? ? ? --guess who pays & the asking price for a a new motor min 77,000baht .
